original_text: God presented Christ as a sacrifice of atonement, through the shedding of his blood—to be received by faith. He did this to demonstrate his righteousness, because in his forbearance he had left the sins committed beforehand unpunished—
korean_text: 이 예수를 하나님이 그의 피로써 믿음으로 말미암는 화목제물로 세우셨으니 이는 하나님께서 길이 참으시는 중에 전에 지은 죄를 간과하심으로 자기의 의로우심을 나타내려 하심이니

sentences.original_text: God presented Christ as a sacrifice
through the shedding of his blood
He did this to demonstrate his righteousness
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 의를 나타내시기 위해 이렇게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: he had left the sins committed beforehand
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 미리 지어진 죄들을 내버려 두셨다
